name: Baloo
title: von Bruinwald XIII
action:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
LET'S MAKE LIKE A TREE When this character is banished, gain 2 lore.

name: Bernard
title: Brand-New Agent
action: <mark>I’LL CHECK IT OUT</mark> At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted, you may ready another chosen character of yours.
flavour: “You stay there. I’ll look for scattered lore.“

name: Chernabog
title: Evildoer
action:
THE POWER OF EVIL When you play this character, pay 1 ⬡ less for every character card in your discard.
SUMMON THE SPIRITS When you play this character, shuffle all character cards from your discard into your deck.
flavour: The darkness calls all its subjects.

name: Dalmatian Puppy
title: Tail Wagger
action: <mark>WHERE DID THEY ALL COME FROM?</mark> You may have up to 99 copies of Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger in your deck.
flavour: First they steal your heart. Then they steal your chair.

name: Joshua Sweet
title: The Doctor
action: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavour: “Heading out to the Inklands? Come on back if youu need patching up.”

name: Kida
title: Atlantean
flavour: Welcome to the Inklands. (Atlantean language)

name: Kida
title: Protector of Atlantis
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Kida.)
PERHAPS WE CAN SAVE OUR FUTURE When you play this character, all characters get -3 ※ until the start of your next turn.
flavour:
“She has been chosen.” 
–King Kashekim Nedakh

name: Lucky
title: The 15th Puppy
action:
GOOD AS NEW ↷ – Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put each character card with cost 2 or less into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
PUPPY LOVE Whenever this character quests, if you have 4 or more other characters in play, your other characters get +1 ◆ this turn.

name: Minnie Mouse
title: Musical Artist
action:
Singer 3 (This character counts as cost 3 to sing songs.)
ENTOURAGE Whenever you play a character with Bodyguard, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
flavour: Her musical talents are off the charts!

name: Miss Bianca
title: International Rescue Aid Society Agent
action: Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)
flavour:
“Our society has never failed to answer a call for help.”
–Mr. Chairman

name: Mr. Snoops
title: Inept Businessman
flavour:
“This is simple, Snoops! I want that lore! The one that shines like a diamond!” 
–Madame Medusa

name: Nani
title: Protective Sister
action: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavour: “Let me handle this, Lilo”

name: Orville
title: Flying Ace
flavour:
Damn, look at the speed of these machines!
What do you call that again? Ink Runners?
I wish I could fly like that.

name: Patch
title: Little Menace
action: <mark>BARK</mark> ↷ – Chosen character gets -2 ※ until the start of your next turn.
flavour: Fast like lightning, and ready to take on any bad guy.

name: Perdita
title: Devoted Mother
action: <mark>COME ALONG, CHILDREN</mark> When you play this character and whenever she quests, you may play a character with cost 2 or less from your discard for free.
flavour: Her pups will follow her anywhere.

name: Piglet
title: Pooh Pirate Captain
action: <mark>AND I'M THE CAPTAIN!</mark> While you have 2 or more other characters in play, this characters gets +2 ◆.
flavour: “Ahoy! There's lore out there, and I'm g-gonna find it!”

name: Pluto
title: Determined Defender
action:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Pluto.)
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
GUARD DOG At the start of your turn, remove up to 3 damage from this character.

name: Pluto
title: Friendly Pooch
action: <mark>GOOD DOG</mark> ↷ – You pay 1 ⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.
flavour: He just can't wait for new friends to arrive!

name: Pongo
title: Determined Father
action: <mark>TWILIGHT BARK</mark> Once per turn, you may pay 2 ⬡ to reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: “We'll find our way. I know we will!”

name: Queen of Hearts
title: Wonderland Empress
action: <mark>ALL WAYS HERE ARE MY WAYS</mark> Whenever this character quests, your other Villain characters get +1 ◆ this turn.
flavour: The more of the Inklands she claims, the more she wants.

name: Rolly
title: Hungry Pup
action: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)
flavour: “I'm hungry, Mother. I really am.”

name: Tinker Bell
title: Generous Fairy
action: <mark>MAKE A NEW FRIEND</mark> When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavour: Plenty of berries - and friendship - to go around.

name: Wendy Darling
title: Talented Sailor
flavour: With Tink’s upgrades in place, Wendy took them to the skies to find the missing mermaid.

name: 99 Puppies
action: Whenever one of your characters quests this turn, gain 1 lore.
flavour:
“Two, four, six, and three is nine, plus two is 11 . . .” 
−Roger

name: Boss’s Orders
action: Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)
flavour:
“Snoops! I know you can look harder! Find me that lore!” 
−Madame Medusa

name: Heal What Has Been Hurt
action:
(A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character. Draw a card.
flavour:
Let your power shine 
Make the clock reverse . . .

name: Quick Patch
action: Remove up to 3 damage from chosen location.
flavour: “Good as new! Well, almost.”

name: The Bare Necessities
action:
(A character with cost 2 or more can Exert.png to sing this song for free.)
Chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a non-character card of your choice.
flavour: Forget about your worries and your strife. . . .

name: Cleansing Rainwater
action: <mark>ANCIENT POWER</mark> Banish this item – Remove up to 2 damage from each of your characters.
flavour: Rainwater lands as stone melts and dragons fly again.

name: Heart of Atlantis
action: <mark>LIFE GIVER</mark> ↷ – You pay 2 ⬡ less for the next character you play this turn.
flavour:
“It’s what’s keeping you–all of Atlantis–alive!“ 
–Milo Thatch

name: Wildcat’s Wrench
action: <mark>REBUILD</mark> ↷ – Remove up to 2 damage from chosen location.
flavour: The right tool makes all the difference.

name: Never Land
title: Mermaid Lagoon
flavour: The mermaids told Peter they'd seen some items floating by several days earlier, but they were more concerned that one of their sisters had gone missing.

name: Pride Lands
title: Pride Rock
action:
WE ARE ALL CONNECTED Characters get +2 ⛨ while here.
LION HOME If you have a Prince or King character here, you pay 1 ⬡ less to play characters.

name: Tiana's Palace
title: Jazz Restaurant
action: <mark>NIGHT OUT</mark> Characters can't be challenged while here.
flavour: In New Orleans, dreams can come true.

name: Alice
title: Tea Alchemist
action: <mark>CURIOUSER AND CURIOUSER</mark> ↷ – Exert chosen opposing character and all other opposing characters with the same name.
flavour: With the right tea leaves and a little magic, she creates the perfect cup for any party guest.

name: Chernabog's Followers
title: Creatures of Evil
action: <mark>RESTLESS SOULS</mark> Whenever this character quests, you may banish this character to draw a card.
flavour: Let chaos reign.

name: Diablo
title: Loyal Familiar
action: <mark>IN SEARCH OF AURORA</mark> Whenever you play a character named Maleficent, you may look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavour: With a little ink-enhanced magic, nothing escapes his sight.

name: Genie
title: Supportive Friend
action: <mark>THREE WISHES</mark> Whenever this character quests, you may shuffle this card into your deck to draw 3 cards.
flavour: “Right here, direct from the lamp, right here for your very much wish fulfillment.”

name: Hydros
title: Ice Titan
action: <mark>BLIZZARD</mark> ↷ − Exert chosen character.
flavour: “Freeze Zeus!”

name: Iago
title: Pretty Polly
action: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavour:
“Your majesty certainly has a way with dumb animals.” 
–Jafar

name: Jafar
title: Lamp Thief
action: <mark>I AM YOUR MASTER NOW</mark> When you play this character, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.
flavour: “I will rule as far as the eye can see.”

name: Jafar
title: Striking Illusionist
action:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Jafar.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
POWER BEYOND MEASURE During your turn, while this character is exerted, whenever you draw a card, gain 1 lore.

name: Lena Sabrewing
title: Rebellious Teenager
action: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
flavour: Born from the shadows. Saved by friendship.

name: Magic Broom
title: Dancing Duster
action: <mark>ENERGETIC CLEANING</mark> When you play this character, if you have a Sorcerer character in play, exert an opposing character. The chosen character doesn't ready at the start of their next turn.
flavour: Superlative order.

name: Magic Broom
title: Fast Cleaner
action:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.)
CLEAN THIS, CLEAN THAT When you play this character, you may shuffle all Broom characters from your discard to your deck.
flavour: Express Cleanliness.

name: Magic Broom
title: The Big Sweeper
action: <mark>CLEAN SWEEP</mark> While this character is at a location, it gets +2 ※.
flavour: Super-sized tidiness.

name: Magic Carpet
title: Flying Rug
action:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
FIND THE WAY ↷ – Move a character of yours to a location for free.
flavour:
“Carpet and I can swoop in, grab the lore, and be back before anyone knows it!” 
–Aladdin

name: Magica De Spell
title: Ambitious Witch
flavour: “Feed my power, Dark Eclipse. Free my form from the abyss. Dormant magic now unchain, the Shadow Queen be whole again!”

name: Magica De Spell
title: The Midas Touch
action:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Magica De Spell.)
ALL MINE Whenever this character quests, gain lore equal to the cost of one of your items in play.
flavour: “I can feel my powers growing the closer I get to Scrooge's precious dime!”

name: Magica De Spell
title: Thieving Sorceress
action: <mark>TELEKINESIS</mark> ↷ – Return chosen item with cost equal to or less than this character's ※ to its player's hand.
flavour: “Do you know what I call this? A good start!”

name: Maleficent
title: Mistress of Evil
action:
DARK KNOWLEDGE Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card.
DIVINATION During your turn, whenever you draw a card, you may move 1 damage counter from a chosen character to a chosen opposing character.

name: Mama Odie
title: Voice of Wisdom
action: <mark>LISTEN TO YOUR MAMA NOW</mark> Whenever this character quests, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.
flavour: “That's the way to give it what it needs, Juju!”

name: Pua
title: Potbellied Buddy
action: <mark>ALWAYS THERE</mark> When this character is banished, you may shuffle this card into your deck.
flavour: Always ready to lend a hand . . . er, snout.

name: Rafiki
title: Mystical Fighter
action:
Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 ※.)
ANCIENT SKILLS Whenever he challenges a Hyena character, this character takes no damage from the challenge.
flavour: Mind the stick!

name: Stratos
title: Tornado Titan
action:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
CYCLONE ↷ – Gain lore equal to the number of Titan characters you have in play.
flavour: “Blow Zeus away!”

name: The Firebird
title: Force of Destruction
flavour:
It rages through the forest, 
Wings spread wide with flame 
Spring sings its ancient chorus 
And green renews its claim

name: The Queen
title: Hateful Rival
flavour:
“A cobweb's strand to hold her fast 
An eagle's eye to see her well 
Sands of time to steal her past 
Thus I cast my magic spell!”

name: Treasure Guardian
title: Protector of the Cave
action: <mark>WHO DISTURBS MY SLUMBER?</mark> This character can't challenge or quest unless it is at a location.
flavour: “Only one may enter here.”

name: Ursula
title: Sea Witch
action: <mark>YOU'RE TOO LATE</mark> Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't ready at the start of their next turn.
flavour: The secret contract has already been written.

name: Bestow a Gift
action: Move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.
flavour:
“From magic ink I call this gift 
Fly my minion, thy wings be swift!” 
–Maleficent

name: It Calls Me
action:
(A character with cost 1 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Draw a card. Shuffle up to 3 cards from your opponent’s discard into your opponent’s deck.
flavour: I am everything I’ve learned and more

name: Last-Ditch Effort
action: Exert chosen opposing character. Then chosen character of yours gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 ※ while challenging.)
flavour: “I got your back”

name: The Boss Is on a Roll
action:
(A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put any number of them on the top or the bottom of your deck in any order. Gain 1 lore.
flavour: Go ahead! Make your choice!

name: The Lamp
action: <mark>GOOD OR EVIL</mark> Banish this item – If you have a character named Jafar in play, draw 2 cards. If you have a character named Genie in play, return chosen character with cost 4 or less to their player's hand.

name: The Sorcerer's Hat
action: <mark>INCREDIBLE ENERGY</mark> ↷, 1 ⬡ − Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put that card into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.
flavour: Minnie approached it cautiously. Whoever had placed it here might have prepared traps.

name: Forbidden Mountain
title: Maleficent's Castle
flavour: An eerie quiet surrounds the castle-but beware of the dangerous occupant within.

name: The Queen's Castle
title: Mirror Chamber
action: <mark>USING THE MIRROR</mark> At the start of your turn, for each character you have here, you may draw a card.
flavour: Those who visit the mirror can choose their question−but not the answer.

name: The Sorcerer's Tower
title: Wondrous Workspace
action:
BROOM CLOSET Your characters named Magic Broom may move here for free.
MAGICAL POWER Characters get +1 ◆ while here.
flavour: Everything you need to make some magic.

name: Cubby
title: Mighty Lost Boy
action: <mark>THE BEAR</mark> Whenever this character moves to a location, he gets +3 ※ this turn.
flavour: With Peter holding off Hook, Cubby did what he does best: break stuff.

name: Cursed Merfolk
title: Ursula's Handiwork
action: <mark>POOR SOULS</mark> Whenever this character is challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card.
flavour:
“Now it’s happened once or twice, someone couldn’t pay the price . . .” 
–Ursula

name: Don Karnage
title: Pirate Prince
action: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavour: “You never thought you’d find me here, right? To be honest, neither did I.”

name: Flotsam
title: Riffraff
action: <mark>EERIE PAIR</mark> Your characters named Jetsam get +3 ※.
flavour: “Ursula needs lore to complete her plan. . . .”

name: Friar Tuck
title: Priest of Nottingham
action: <mark>YOU THIEVING SCOUNDREL</mark> When you play this character, the player or players with the most cards in their hand chooses and discards a card.
flavour: “Get outta my church! Out! Out! Out!”

name: Helga Sinclair
title: Femme Fatale
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Helga Sinclair.)
THIS CHANGES EVERYTHING Whenever this character quests, you may deal 3 damage to chosen damaged character.

name: Helga Sinclair
title: Vengeful Partner
action: <mark>NOTHING PERSONAL</mark> When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.
flavour: “You said we were in this together!”

name: Jetsam
title: Riffraff
action:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
EERIE PAIR Your characters named Flotsam gain Ward.
flavour: “There must be powerful lore here, very powerful.”

name: Kit Cloudkicker
title: Tough Guy
action: <mark>SKYSURFING</mark> When you play this character, you may return chosen opposing character with 2 ※ or less to their player's hand.
flavour:
“It's been fun, guys, but I got to be going. 
Yahoooo!”

name: Lyle Tiberius Rourke
title: Cunning Mercenary
action:
WELL, NOW YOU KNOW When you play this character, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can’t quest and must challenge if able.)
THANKS FOR VOLUNTEERING Whenever one of your other characters is banished, each opponent loses 1 lore.

name: Milo Thatch
title: Clever Cartographer
flavour: “Believe me, studying gibberish really can take you places!“

name: Milo Thatch
title: King of Atlantis
action:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 ink to play this on top of one of your characters named Milo Thatch.)
TAKE THEM BY SURPRISE When this character is banished, return all opposing characters to their players’ hands.
flavour: “You don’t know what you’re tampering with.“

name: Morph
title: Space Goo
action: MIMICRY You may play any character with Shift on this character as if this character had any name.
flavour:
“You jiggle-headed blob of mischief!” 
−John Silver

name: Peter Pan
title: Lost Boy Leader
action: <mark>I CAME TO LISTEN TO THE STORIES</mark> Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, gain lore equal to that location's ◆.
flavour: The Illumineers needed someone to find a missing spellbook, and Peter was the first to volunteer.

name: Prince John
title: False King
action: <mark>COLLECT TAXES</mark> Whenever this character quests, each opponent with more Lore than you loses 2 Lore.
flavour:
“Incredible as he is inept, whenever the history books are kept…” 
–Sheriff of Nottingham

name: Robin Hood
title: Daydreamer
flavour: “Some days, it’s nice to let the river do the running.”

name: Shenzi
title: Hyena Pack Leader
action:
<mark>I WILL DO IT</mark> When this character is at a location, she gets +3 ※.
<mark>WHAT’S THE HURRY?</mark> When this character is at a location, when she challenges another character, you may draw a card.
flavour: “We don't you stay for dinner?”

name: Sir Hiss
title: Aggravating Asp
action: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavour: Prince John isn't the only one collecting “taxes”!

name: Skippy
title: Energetic Rabbit
action: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
flavour: Even the bravest outlaw knows when to lie low.

name: Starkey
title: Devious Pirate
flavour: Point him in the right direction, and he'll do the rest.

name: Stitch
title: Covert Agent
action:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
HIDE While this character is at a location, he gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
flavour: For such a flashy dresser, he sure is hard to spot.

name: Ursula
title: Deceiver
action: <mark>YOU'LL NEVER EVEN MISS IT</mark> When you play this character, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a song card of your choice.

name: Ursula
title: Deceiver of All
action: <mark>WHAT A DEAL</mark> Whenever this character sings a song, you may play that song again from your discard for free, then put it on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: “I don't want much−just the most powerful lore!”

name: Wildcat
title: Mechanic
action: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) DISASSEMBLE ↷ – Banish chosen item.
flavour: “I can take anything apart in under five minutes!”

name: Zazu
title: Pride Land’s Manager
action: <mark>IT’S TIME TO LEAVE!</mark> While this character is at a location, he gets +1 lore.
flavour: “I’d be lying if I said I was in charge here, but the Pride Lands still welcomes you!“

name: Touched My Heart
action:
(A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Banish chosen item.
flavour:
He’s not real smart, and yet, 
he’s touched my little cowhide heart.

name: I Will Find My Way
action:
(A character with cost 1 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character of yours gets +2 ※ this turn. They may move to a location for free.
flavour:
I would go most anywhere 
To feel like I belong

name: Strike a Good Match
action:
(A character with cost 2 or more can Exert.png to sing this song for free.)
Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard a card.
flavour:
Please bring honor to us 
Please bring honor to us all

name: Airfoil
action: <mark>I GOT TO BE GOING</mark> ↷ – If you’ve played 2 or more actions this turn, draw a card.
flavour: Discovered in the lost Sea Duck, it looked good as new.

name: Robin's Bow
action:
FOREST’S GIFT ↷ – Deal 1 damage to chosen damaged character or location.
A BIT OF A LARK Whenever a character of yours named Robin Hood quests, you may ready this item.
flavour:
“The forest always provides just what you need.” 
–Robin Hood

name: Starlight Vial
action:
EFFICIENT ENERGY ↷ – You pay 2 ⬡ less for the next action you play this turn.
TRAP 2 ⬡, Banish this item – Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard a card.
flavour: In the wrong hands, this vial of magic could be disastrous.

name: De Vil Manor
title: Cruella's Estate
flavour:
“They say the ol' place is haunted, or bewitched, or some such fiddle-faddle.”
–Colonel

name: Fang
title: River City
action: SURROUNDED BY WATER Characters gain Ward and Evasive while here. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge. Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
flavour: A nation protected by fierce assassins and their even fiercer cats.

name: Kuzco's Palace
title: Home of the Emperor
action: <mark>CITY WALLS</mark> Whenever a character is challenged and banished while here, banish the challenging character.
flavour: “Sure it's a little small, but also it DOESN'T HAVE A POOL!” −Kuzco

name: Ariel
title: Adventurous Collector
action:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
INSPIRING VOICE Whenever you play a song, chosen character of yours gains Evasive until the start of your next turn.
flavour: Shipwrecks are great places to find lore – and hide from sharks!

name: Billy Bones
title: Keeper of the Map
flavour: “He's after me chest, that fiendish cyborg and his band of cutthroats.”

name: Captain Hook
title: Master Swordsman
action:
NEMESIS During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.
MAN-TO-MAN Characters named Peter Pan lose Evasive and can't gain Evasive.

name: Della Duck
title: Unstoppable Mom
action: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
flavour: “I survived the moon. How tough could the flooded Inklands be?”

name: HeiHei
title: Accidental Explorer
action: <mark>MINDLESS WANDERING</mark> Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, each opponent loses 1 lore.
flavour: Considering the coconut.

name: Hydra
title: Lethal Snake
action: <mark>WATCH THE TEETH</mark> When this character is damaged, deal the same amount of damage to a chosen opposing character.
flavour: More heads are better than one.

name: Jim Hawkins
title: Space Traveler
action:
THIS IS IT! When you play this character, you may play a location with cost 4 or less for free.
TAKE THE HELM Whenever you play a location, this character may move there for free.
flavour:
“You’re gonna rattle the stars, you are.” 
–John Silver

name: Jim Hawkins
title: Thrill Seeker
flavour: If you want a bigger reward, you’ve got to take bigger risks.

name: Kakamora
title: Menacing Sailor
action: <mark>PLUNDER</mark> When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 Lore.
flavour: There's a bunch more where he came from.

name: Madame Medusa
title: The Boss
action: <mark>THAT TERRIBLE WOMAN</mark> When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 3 ※ or less.
flavour: “Finding lore will be as easy as taking candy from children.”

name: Maui
title: Winged Demigod
action:
Reckless (They can’t quest and must challenge if able.)
IN MY STOMACH Whenever one of your characters named Heihei quests, this character gets +1 ◆ and loses Reckless for this turn.
flavour: “Do you still have any chicken around?”

name: Maui
title: Whale
action:
<mark>THIS MISSION IS CURSED</mark> This character doesn’t ready at the start of the turn.
<mark>DON’T WORRY, I’M HERE</mark> 2 ⬡ - Ready this character, this character can’t quest for the rest of this turn.
flavour: Always ready to make waves.

name: Milo Thatch
title: Spirited Scholar
action: <mark>I’M YOUR MAN!</mark> While this character is at a location, he gets +2 ※.
flavour: “My grandpa never told me about this place!“

name: Moana
title: Born Leader
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Moana.)
WELCOME TO MY BOAT Whenever this character quests while at a location, ready all other characters here. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

name: Moana
title: Undeterred Voyager
action: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavour: No fire or storm will keep her from her goal.

name: Nutsy
title: Vulture Henchman
flavour:
“Nutsy, button your beak.” 
−Trigger

name: Peter Pan
title: Never Land Hero
action:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
OVER HERE, TINK While you have a character named Tinker Bell in play, this character gets +2 ※.
flavour: With Peter, plans often meant diving headlong into danger.

name: Peter Pan
title: Pirate's Bane
action:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 Cost-plain black.png to play this on top of one of your characters named Peter Pan.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
YOU'RE NEXT! Whenever he challenges a Pirate character, this character takes no damage from the challenge.

name: Prince Eric
title: Expert Helmsman
action: <mark>SURPRISE MANEUVER</mark> When this character is banished, you may banish chosen character.
flavour: The storm came out of nowhere, forcing Eric to turn back before he reached the mysterious structure at the edge of Lorcana.

name: Scroop
title: Backstabber
action: <mark>BRUTE</mark> While this character has damage, he gets +3 ※.
flavour: Always keep him in front of you. And downwind, if possible.

name: Simba
title: Scrappy Cub
flavour: He'll join the hunt for lore after he's had a quick snack.

name: Slightly
title: Lost Boy
action:
THE FOX If you have a character named Peter Pan in play, you pay 1 ⬡ less to play this character.
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavour: “Pirates sure are easy to trick!”

name: Stitch
title: Little Rocket
action: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.)
flavour:
“Who thought giving him power armor was a good idea?!” 
−Nani

name: Trigger
title: Imprecise Shooter
action: <mark>MY OL' BETSY</mark> Your characters named Nutsy gain +1 ◆.
flavour:
“Criminently, Trigger! Point that peashooter the other way.” 
–Sheriff of Nottingham

name: Webby Vanderquack
title: Enthusiastic Duck
flavour: “Finding lore is a lot easier when you have a grappling hook!”

name: Divebomb
action: Banish one of your characters with Reckless to banish chosen character with less ※ than that character.

name: I've Got a Dream
action:
(A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Ready chosen character of yours at a location. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. Gain lore equal to that location ◆.
flavour:
Tor would like to quit and be a florist 
Gunther does interior design

name: On Your Feet! Now!
action: Ready all your characters and deal 1 damage to each of them. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
flavour: “Catch them! Before they get away!”

name: Voyage
action: Move up to 2 characters of yours to the same location for free.
flavour: “We were voyagers! Why’d we stop?” –Moana

name: Maui's Fish Hook
action:
IT'S MAUI TIME! If you have a character named Maui in play, you may use this item's Shapeshift ability for free.
SHAPESHIFT ↷, 2 ⬡ – Choose one:
· Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
· Chosen character gets +3 ※ this turn.

name: Sumerian Talisman
action: <mark>SOURCE OF MAGIC</mark> During your turn, whenever one of your characters is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.
flavour:
“Summoned spirit from the dark 
Show thyself before this arc.” 
−Lena Sabrewing

name: Agrabah
title: Marktplatz
flavour:
“Willkommen in Agrabah. Stadt voller Geheimnisse. Voller Zauber. Und den verlockensten Angeboten diesseits des Joordans!” 
–Händler

name: Jolly Roger
title: Hook's Ship
action:
LOOK ALIVE, YOU SWABS! Characters gain Rush while here. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)
ALL HANDS ON DECK! Your Pirate characters may move here for free.

name: RLS Legacy
title: Solar Galleon
action:
THIS IS OUR SHIP Characters gain Evasive while here. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
HEAVE TOGETHER NOW If you have a character here, you pay 2 ⬡ less to move a character of yours here.

name: Audrey Ramirez
title: The Engineer
action:
Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.)
SPARE PARTS Whenever this character quests, ready one of your items.
flavour: “How’d you break this thing, anyway?”

name: Captain Amelia
title: First in Command
action: DISCIPLINE During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
flavour: “I've spotted a strange structure on the horizon. Hard to port, helmsman!”

name: Dewey
title: Showy Nephew
action: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)
flavour: “I got it! I knew I could do it! Dewey for the win!”

name: Flintheart Glomgold
title: Lone Cheater
action: THEY'LL NEVER SEE IT COMING! During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
flavour: “Nobody tells Flintheart Glomgold what to do!”

name: Genie
title: Cramped in the Lamp
flavour: "Ten-thousand years will give ya such a crick in the neck!"

name: Gramma Tala
title: Keeper of Ancient Stories
action: <mark>THERE WAS ONLY OCEAN</mark> When you play this character, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may add one into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavour: Listen with your whole heart, and the ancestors will guide you.

name: Gramma Tala
title: Spirit of the Ocean
action:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Gramma Tala.)
DO YOU KNOW WHO YOU ARE? Whenever a card is put into your inkwell, gain 1 lore.
flavour: She will always be with you, no matter how far your journey takes you.

name: Gyro Gearloose
title: Gadget Genius
action: <mark>FOLLOW THE TWISTS OF MY GENIUS BRAIN</mark> ↷ - Put an item card from your discard to the top of your deck.
flavour: “Maybe this technology will be less bad this time.”

name: Huey
title: Savvy Nephew
action:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)
THREE NEPHEWS Whenever this character quests, if you have characters named Dewey and Louie in play, you may draw 3 cards.
flavour: “This looks like part of a larger crystal!”

name: King Louie
title: Bandleader
flavour: “Hold up, cuz. Why not sit back and enjoy some sweet beats?”

name: Kit Cloudkicker
title: Navigator
action: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Kit Cloudkicker.) Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

name: Kit Cloudkicker
title: Spunky Bear Cub
action: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
flavour: Thrilled to have his airfoil back, he launched into the Inklands.

name: Louie
title: Chill Nephew
action: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)
flavour: “Found the last one!”

name: Lady Marian
title: Adorable Dreamer
action: <mark>ELEGANT AND NOBLE LADY</mark> When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 ※ for this turn.
flavour: She makes every place even more beautiful.

name: Mama Odie
title: Mystical Maven
action: <mark>THIS GOING TO BE GOOD</mark> Whenever you play a song, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour: “You dig a little deeper, you'll find everything you need.”

name: Pluto
title: Mickey's Clever Friend
flavour: Pluto's job was to keep Gustav's attention so Minnie could get to the cave.

name: Rufus
title: Orphanage Cat
action: <mark>A LITTLE TOO OLD TO HUNT MICE</mark> When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour: Faith and a little blue bird, which you see in the distance.

name: Scrooge McDuck
title: Richest Duck in the World
action:
I'M GOING HOME! During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
I DIDN'T GET RICH BY BEING STUPID During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may play an item for free.
flavour: He can make money anywhere.

name: Scrooge McDuck
title: Uncle Moneybags
action: TREASURE FINDER  Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 ⬡ less for the next item you play this turn.
flavour: A strange new world is the perfect place to make a strange new fortune!

name: The Queen
title: Mirror Seeker
action: <mark>CALCULATING AND VAIN</mark> Whenever this character quests, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.
flavour: She has only one question, and she'd better like the answer.

name: Tinker Bell
title: Very Clever Fairy
action: <mark>I CAN USE THAT</mark> Whenever one of your items is banished, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour: She lives in a world of possibilities.

name: Wendy Darling
title: Authority on Peter Pan
action:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)

name: Distract
action: Chosen character gets -2 ※ this turn. Draw a card.

name: Friend Like Me
action:
(A character with cost 5 or more can exert to sing this song for free.)
Each player puts the top 3 cards of their deck into their inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour: You got some power in your corner now

name: How Far I'll Go
action:
(A character with cost 4 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: Repair
action: Remove up to 3 damage from one of your locations or characters.
flavour: “I'm thinkin' about opening a shop here. What do you think?”

name: Aurelian Gyrosensor
action: <mark>SEEKING KNOWLEDGE</mark> Whenever one of your characters quests, you may look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavour:
“It can point toward lost lore, but if you're not careful, it'll lead you off a cliff.” 
−Venturo, an Illumineer

name: Heart of Te Fiti
action: <mark>CREATE LIFE</mark> ↷, 2 ⬡ – Put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour: It takes a pure heart to calm the raging storm within.

name: Lucky Dime
action: <mark>NUMBER ONE</mark> ↷, 2 ⬡ − Choose a character of yours and gain lore equal to their ◆.
flavour: This one simple coin changed Scrooge’s life forever.

name: Scrooge's Top Hat
action: <mark>BUSINESS EXPERTISE</mark> ↷ – You pay 1 ⬡ less for the next item you play this turn.
flavour: Just the thing to top off another brilliant deal.

name: Vault Door
action: SEALED AWAY Your locations and character at locations gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
flavour: “Only Scrooge knows about this vault. And he’s going to keep it that way.”

name: Belle's House
title: Maurice's Workshop
action: <mark>LABORATORY</mark> If you have a character here, you pay 1 ⬡ less to play items.
flavour: Some of the most important tools in Lorcana are crafted here.

name: McDuck Manor
title: Scrooge's Mansion
flavour:
“It's only the coolest home in Lorcana!” 
–Webby Vanderquack

name: Motunui
title: Island Paradise
action: <mark>REINCARNATION</mark> Whenever a character is banished while here, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: Chief Tui
title: Proud of Motunui
flavour: “Look at our home! There is no better place to be.”

name: Eeyore
title: Overstuffed Donkey
action: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
flavour: “Not much of a roadblock, but I suppose I'll do.”

name: Gustav the Giant
title: Terror of the Kingdom
action:
ALL TIED UP This character enters play exerted and can't ready at the start of your turn.
BREAK FREE During your turn, whenever one of your other characters banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready this character.

name: Hades
title: Wrathful Ruler
action: <mark>CALLING THE TITANS</mark> ↷ – Ready your Titan characters.
flavour: “Brothers! Titans! Look at you, in your miserable prison. Who put you down there?”

name: Helga Sinclair
title: Right-Hand Woman
action: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 ※.)
flavour: “That was an order, not a suggestion. Let’s go!“

name: John Silver
title: Greedy Treasure Seeker
action: CHART YOUR OWN COURSE For each location you have in play, this character gains Resist +1 and gets +1 ◆. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
flavour: “I was never much good at games. Always hated to lose.”

name: Kida
title: Royal Warrior
action: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavour: She’s seen strange things before, but nothing like this.

name: Little John
title: Resourceful Outlaw
action:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Little John.)
OKAY, BIG SHOT While this character is exerted, your characters with Bodyguard gain Resist +1 and get +1 ◆. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

name: Little John
title: Robin's Companion
action:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
DISGUISED During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Lythos
title: Rock Titan
action:
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)
STONE SKIN ↷ − Chosen character gains Resist +2 this turn.
flavour: “Crush Zeus!”

name: Mickey Mouse
title: Stalwart Explorer
action: <mark>LET'S TAKE A LOOK</mark> This character gets +1 ※ for each location you have in play.
flavour: Mickey knew just where to start searching for the Sorcerer's Hat, but he didn't expect it to be guarded.

name: Mickey Mouse
title: Trumpeter
action: <mark>BUGLE CALL</mark> ↷, 2 ⬡ - Play a character for free.

name: Minnie Mouse
title: Funky Spelunker
action: <mark>JOURNEY</mark> While this character is at a location, she gets +2 ※.
flavour: She'll never cave under pressure.

name: Mr. Smee
title: Clumsy Sailor
action: <mark>OH LA LA LA LA</mark> At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted while you do not have a Captain character in play, deal 1 damage to this character.
flavour: “Catch these little-OUCH!”

name: Mufasa
title: Champion of the Pride Lands
flavour: Even his name makes enemies quiver in fear.

name: Nala
title: Fierce Friend
flavour: “Pinned ya again.”

name: Pyros
title: Lava Titan
action: <mark>ERUPTION</mark> During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready chosen character.
flavour: “Melt Zeus!”

name: Razoul
title: Palace Guard
action: <mark>LOOKY HERE</mark> While this character has no damage, he gets +2 ※.
flavour: “There's no princess here to save you this time, street rat.”

name: Robin Hood
title: Beloved Outlaw
flavour: “You call this an ambush? Tsk, tsk. It's barely a bushwhack.”

name: Robin Hood
title: Champion of Sherwood
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Robin Hood.)
SKILLED COMBATANT During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, gain 2 lore.
THE GOOD OF OTHERS When this character is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.

name: Sheriff of Nottingham
title: Corrupt Official
action: <mark>TAXES SHOULD HURT</mark> Whenever you discard a card, you may deal 1 damage to chosen opposing character.
flavour: The thirteenth Rule of Villainy: Take everything you can, but do it with a smile.

name: Simba
title: Fighting Prince
action:
SUBMIT OR FIGHT When you play this character and whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge during your turn, choose one:
· You may draw 2 cards, then choose and discard 2 cards.
· You may deal 2 damage to chosen character.
flavour: He is ready to restore his past glory to the Pride Lands.

name: Simba
title: Rightful King
action: <mark>TRIUMPHANT STANCE</mark> During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, chosen opposing character can't challenge during their next turn.
flavour: With dangers multiplying all around, the pride needs its guardian.

name: Thaddeus E. Klang
title: Metal Head
action: <mark>SHARP JAW</mark> Whenever this character quests while at a location, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.
flavour: “Soon, the bells will toll the death knell of your destiny!“

name: And Then Along Came Zeus
action:
(A character with cost 4 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Deal 5 damage to chosen character or location.
flavour:
He hurled his thunderbolt−He zapped 
Locked those suckers in a vault−They're trapped 
And on his own stopped chaos in its tracks

name: Ba-Boom!
action: Deal 2 damage to chosen character or location.
flavour: Bigger than your average boom!

name: Olympus Would Be That Way
action: Your characters get +3 ※ this turn while challenging a location.
flavour:
“Now that I set you free, what is the first thing you are going to do?” 
–Hades

name: Rise of the Titans
action: Banish chosen location or item.
flavour:
“Oh, we're in trouble, big trouble!” 
–Hermes

name: Captain Hook’s Rapier
action:
GET THOSE SCURVY BRATS! During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes another character in a challenge, you may pay 1 ⬡ to draw a card.
LET’S HAVE AT IT! Your characters named Captain Hook gain Challenger +1. (They get +1 ※ while challenging.)

name: Gizmosuit
action: CYBERNETIC ARMOR Banish this item – Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)
flavour: It stands in the Hall of Lorcana, waiting for someone to speak the secret words.

name: Map of Treasure Planet
action:
KEY TO THE PORTAL ↷ – You pay 1 ⬡ less for the next location you play this turn.
SHOW THE WAY You pay 1 ⬡ less to move your characters to a location.
flavour:
“Gentlemen, this must be kept under lock and key.” 
−Captain Amelia

name: Maui's Place of Exile
title: Hidden Island
action: ISOLATED Characters gain Resist +1 while here. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
flavour: Nothing but boulders and sand-easy to miss.

name: Nottingham
title: Prince John's Castle
flavour:
Sir Hiss: “I say, ssssire, your mother’s castle would be the perfect place to bring our plan to life!” 
Prince John: “Mummy!”

name: The Bayou
title: Mysterious Swamp
action: <mark>SHOW ME THE WAY</mark> Whenever a character quests while here, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
flavour: A place to find what you need, not just what you want.

name: Chernabog
title: Evildoer
action:
THE POWER OF EVIL When you play this character, pay 1 ⬡ less for every character card in your discard.
SUMMON THE SPIRITS When you play this character, shuffle all character cards from your discard into your deck.

name: Kida
title: Protector of Atlantis
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Kida.)
PERHAPS WE CAN SAVE OUR FUTURE When you play this character, all characters get -3 ※ until the start of your next turn.

name: Pride Lands
title: Pride Rock
action:
WE ARE ALL CONNECTED Characters get +2 ⛨ while here.
LION HOME If you have a Prince or King character here, you pay 1 ⬡ less to play characters.

name: Jafar
title: Striking Illusionist
action:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Jafar.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
POWER BEYOND MEASURE During your turn, while this character is exerted, whenever you draw a card, gain 1 lore.

name: Maleficent
title: Mistress of Evil
action:
DARK KNOWLEDGE Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card.
DIVINATION During your turn, whenever you draw a card, you may move 1 damage counter from a chosen character to a chosen opposing character.

name: The Sorcerer's Hat
action: <mark>INCREDIBLE ENERGY</mark> ↷, 1 ⬡ − Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put that card into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

name: Morph
title: Space Goo
action: MIMICRY You may play any character with Shift on this character as if this character had any name.

name: Kuzco's Palace
title: Home of the Emperor
action: <mark>CITY WALLS</mark> Whenever a character is challenged and banished while here, banish the challenging character.

name: Captain Hook
title: Master Swordsman
action:
NEMESIS During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.
MAN-TO-MAN Characters named Peter Pan lose Evasive and can't gain Evasive.

action:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 ink to play this on top of one of your characters named Peter Pan.)

YOU’RE NEXT! Whenever he challenges a Pirate character, this character takes no damage from the challenge.

action: <mark>BUGLE CALL</mark> ↷, 2 ⬡ - Play a character for free.
